attributes.additional_details: Models have been cyber bullied over the president club commotion and it’s now gone to anew low of stopping F1 and the walk on dart girls. What ever next? What happened to women’s rights? This is also a MALE INDUSTRY WHICH IS OVERLOOKED!  These models have educated backgrounds and are professionals such as nurses lawyers and teachers! Models choose to do this, they do it well and love what they do. Are they harming anyone? No!
attributes.background: I have been a promotional model for over 8 years and I started up my own agency to help support these self employed models to get reliable professional clients to work for they are amazing ladies with beautiful personalities. Never judge a book by its cover!

rejection.details: This is a decision made by employers, not an action that the UK Government and Parliament have taken.
